result.reason: RDP full screen resolution is calculated from panel/form bounds instead of actual monitor resolution, causing understated desktop dimensions sent to the RDP ActiveX control.
result.approach: Use Screen.FromControl() or Screen.FromRectangle() to obtain the correct monitor's physical Bounds when entering full screen, then set DesktopWidth/DesktopHeight from those bounds rather than the panel or form size; account for DPI scaling if needed.
